derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from French, or from medieval Latin jujuba, based on Greek zizuphos

means.word_mean: 1. spiny tree having dark red edible fruits
2. dark red plum-like fruit of Old World buckthorn trees
3. chewy fruit-flavored jellied candy (sometimes medicated to soothe a sore throat)
